name: AnaphylacticReactionToHepatitisAVaccine
title: Anaphylactic Reaction to Hepatitis A Vaccine
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a history of an anaphylactic (extreme allergy) reaction to hepatitis A vaccine.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with an anaphylactic reaction to hepatitis A vaccine.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
